EmailTemplate.name: Inbound Web 4th voicemail
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you from VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I hope that I'm reaching you at the appropriate address. Our team here at VMTurbo is committed to providing the most cost-effective and superior management tools on the market. We appreciate your feedback about your experiences with our appliance, and we hope that you will take in interest in some of our other tools as well. Please let me know if you have an interest in learning more, or any feedback that you'd like to share would be equally appreciated.
Thanks,
{!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName}
Phone: 781.373.3540 ~ Fax: 781.373.3257 Top 10 Reasons to Choose VMTurbo - http://tiny.cc/4kmu4
